'''A Wanmin Welcome''' is a [[Web Event]] in [[Version 1.4]].

==Event Details==
===How to Participate===
'''PC & Mobile:''' >>[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/ys/event/e20210316cooking-sea/index.html Click Here to Take Part in the Event]<<<br>
※ Once you have accessed the event page, please log in using your miHoYo account and select the appropriate server and corresponding character in order to ensure that you will be able to receive and claim your event rewards.

'''PS4:''' Access from the event mail in the [[Paimon Menu]] > Mail<br>
※ To ensure that you are able to easily access the event, please do not delete the event mail.

===Event Duration===
2021/3/16 13:00 – 2021/3/25 23:59 (UTC+8)

===Reward Collection End===
2021/3/30 23:59 (UTC+8)

===Event Summary===
During the event, you can select from 9 set meals, each of which consists of 6 dishes. Cook these dishes and put different set meals together to obtain the corresponding in-game items as rewards. Additionally, every dish made will be sent to you via in-game mail.
*You can obtain rewards for a total of 3 set meals, and each set meal must be completed before the next one can be made.

===Notes===
*Travelers, please log in to the event using your miHoYo Account and select your server and corresponding character to take part. This will ensure that your rewards can be sent and claimed correctly.
*Daily cooking attempts will refresh at 00:00 server time, and all attempts can only be used on the day itself. Unused cooking attempts will not accumulate across days. Remember to swing by to help Xiangling out every day!
*For PlayStation players, please access the event page through in-game mail and scan the QR Code to take part in the event.
*During the update maintenance on March 17 from 06:00 to 11:00 (UTC+8), there will be some delay to the distribution of rewards for this event. Delayed rewards will be sent out via in-game mail within 24 hours after the maintenance ends.

==Event Rewards==
*For each dish that you make on the event page, 1 serving of that corresponding dish will be sent via in-game mail to the account you have linked.
*Each Traveler can obtain rewards for a total of 3 set meals, and only 1 set meal can be made at any given time. You can only continue to select and make a new set meal after having claimed the rewards for the current set meal.
*You can continue to cook dishes even after the rewards from the 3 set meals have all been claimed, and if successful, you will continue to be sent in-game dishes until the event ends.

==Daily Tasks==
Every day, you will obtain 1 cooking attempt at the login page. You will be able to obtain more through Daily Tasks. During the event, you will be able to obtain 3 cooking attempts each day.
*Share Event Page
*Check out the fan art in the HoYoLAB Community
*Go to the official YouTube channel
*Go to the official Facebook page
*Go to our official Instagram
